entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Sirius is described as the parents' best friend and someone who would have been like a father to Harry if he were there. ("his parents' best friend", "It would have been the next best thing to having his own father back")

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is described as a student who has passed his exams and is concerned about Sirius's absence. ("Harry couldn't help feeling miserable when he thought of the home he might have had", "The exam results came out on the last day of term")

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who has passed his exams. ("Harry, Ron, and Hermione had passed every subject")

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as one of Harry's friends who has passed her exams. ("Harry, Ron, and Hermione had passed every subject")

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is described as someone who might have intervened to prevent Snape from failing Harry in Potions. ("He had a shrewd suspicion that Dumbledore might have stepped in to stop Snape failing him on purpose")

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is described as someone who dislikes Harry and has been behaving alarmingly towards him. ("Snape's behavior toward Harry over the past week had been quite alarming", "A muscle twitched unpleasantly at the corner of Snape's thin mouth every time he looked at Harry")
